## About

I'm a dedicated student at **Harvey Mudd College**, pursuing a dual major in Engineering and Economics. I've gained valuable experience through internships at **Ford**, **Abercrombie & Fitch**, and **North American Switchgear**, working on both technical engineering and business-focused projects.

I'm actively involved in **advanced rocketry**, **robotics**, and **signal processing** projects, combining hands-on hardware expertise with analytical problem-solving. Beyond academics, I'm a **varsity track and field athlete** and **SCIAC champion**.

## E155: Microcontrollers & FPGA Design

This website documents my journey through **E155: Microcontrollers and FPGA Design** at Harvey Mudd College. Here you'll find detailed lab reports, code implementations, and technical documentation showcasing my engineering problem-solving process.
